stories.headline: D.C's 'Deadly Force'
stories.summary: The story examines D.C. police shooting and killing more people per resident than any major U.S. city in the 1990s, utilizing a detailed analysis of the FBI's Supplementary Homicide Report.

stories.headline: The Price of Concentrated Competition
stories.summary: An analysis of Nasdaq trading records reveals investors incur higher costs when trading is concentrated among fewer dealers, impacting millions of investors.

stories.headline: Ignored Restrictions
stories.summary: Examines how developers in Los Angeles ignored growth and environmental restrictions, increasing public relief costs following natural disasters.
